text: Bamwe mu Barabu bo mu cyaro banze kujya ku rugamba, bazakubwira bati “Twahugijwe n’imitungo yacu ndetse n’imiryango yacu, bityo dusabire imbabazi.” Bavugisha indimi zabo ibitari mu mitima yabo. Vuga uti “Ese ni nde wagira icyo abamarira kwa Allah, aramutse ashaka kubateza ikibi cyangwa ashaka kubagirira neza?” Ahubwo Allah azi neza ibyo mukora
